correctness.rationale: The extraction contains numerous factual errors, untraceable values, and at least one schema violation. Major issues: (1) Misattribution of parameters from the SiO2 PEALD to the IGZO PEALD: plasmaPower 300 W and pressure 1.2 Torr are reported in the article for N2O plasma during SiO2 GI deposition, not for IGZO deposition; IGZO plasma power and pressure are not given. (2) Dosing/purge times are taken from the SiO2 cycle (0.2 s DIPAS, 25 s Ar purge, 10 s N2O, 3 s plasma, 10 s Ar purge) and incorrectly applied to In/Ga/Zn; additionally, units are wrong (MilliSEC used for values that are seconds), making the times off by 1000×. (3) Growth-per-cycle (0.1 Å) and number of cycles (200) are not reported for IGZO; they conflict internally with the stated 20 nm thickness (0.1 Å × 200 cycles = 2 nm). (4) Schema violation: growthPerCycle includes an extra property filmThickness even though growthPerCycle {'additionalProperties': False}; filmThickness is also duplicated at the thicknessControl level. (5) Flow rates (precursor/co-reactant/purge) are fabricated; not in the article. (6) SupercycleDesign (In:Ga:Zn = 1:1:1) is not given in the article and is untraceable. (7) ReactantSelection.coReactant is vague/inaccurate (“O and Ar plasmas” should be O2/Ar plasma mixture) and is provided only for “IGZO” whereas precursors are per element; carrierGas and purgingGas = Ar are not specified for IGZO in the article. (8) Many materialProperties are unsupported or incorrect: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap and “Tauc plot,” resistivity, carrier density and “Hall measurements” (article used field-effect mobility from transfer curves, not Hall), uniformity, conformality, roughness (AFM data in article pertains to SiO2, not IGZO), and film density—all unreported. ElementalConcentration provides a single 10% value with no element, which is meaningless; while the atomic ratio In0.68:Ga0.10:Zn0.22 (XRF) and composition In0.68Ga0.10Zn0.22O are correct. (9) DeviceProperties: μFE = 24.3 cm2/V·s, VTH = 3.7 V, SS = 130 mV/dec are traceable for devices with 300 W GI, but on/off ratio (1e7) is not reported; also, tying these device metrics to a process that incorrectly uses GI parameters for IGZO reduces coherence. (10) Additional untraceable fields: saturation = True, nucleationPeriod = 5 cycles, reactor name, deliveryMethod, safety/filmStability/reproducibility. Corrective actions: remove SiO2 GI parameters from the IGZO process; report only IGZO deposition details explicitly stated (PEALD, 200 °C, precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ, O2/Ar plasma reactant, 20 nm thickness, XRF composition); fix units to seconds; omit unknown GPC/cycles/flow rates/supercycle unless specified; correct device characterization method to field-effect (transfer curves); resolve the schema violation by removing filmThickness from inside growthPerCycle and eliminating duplicate entries.

completeness.rationale: Major incompleteness and schema/traceability problems. The article reports two distinct ALD processes (PEALD-IGZO active layer and PEALD N-doped SiO2 gate insulator with N2O plasma and multiple plasma powers, plus a hybrid GI), but the extraction provides only a single IGZO process and omits the SiO2 (and hybrid GI) processes entirely. Many parameters in the IGZO record are incorrectly taken from the SiO2 process: plasmaPower=300 W and pressure=1.2 Torr are only reported for SiO2 PEALD, not IGZO; dosing/purge times (0.2 s precursor, 25 s purge, 10 s co-reactant, 3 s plasma) belong to SiO2 and are misapplied and mis-unitized as milliseconds. The substrate is incorrect (IGZO was deposited on patterned ITO/SiO2, not on a bare 50 nm SiO2 buffer). Co-reactant mapping is wrong (listed under compound 'IGZO' instead of per In/Ga/Zn and uses vague 'O and Ar plasmas'). ThicknessControl contains invented/untraceable values (GPC=0.1 Å, 200 cycles) that conflict with the 20 nm film thickness and are not reported in the paper; schema violation by nesting numberofCycles and filmThickness inside growthPerCycle. Flow rates (sccm), uniformity, conformality, optical properties, resistivity, carrier density, and film density are fabricated and not traceable to the article. FilmComposition.elementalConcentration is not mapped to the reported composition (only atomic ratio In0.68:Ga0.10:Zn0.22 is given by XRF). Device properties cherry-pick one case (300 W GI) without clarifying condition and ignore the series across 100–300 W and hybrid GI. To be complete: add separate structured processes for (a) PEALD-SiO2 (DIPAS/N2O–Ar plasma, 250 °C, 1.2 Torr, 100–300 W, explicit pulse/purge sequence, 50 nm) and (b) PEALD-IGZO (DADI/TMGa/DEZ with O2/Ar plasma at 200 °C, composition via XRF); correct units and remove guessed times/flows; fix co-reactant mapping and substrate; include the hybrid GI process if reported.
